title: Beats Studio Pro is enjoying a MASSIVE 50% discount RIGHT NOW!
description: The Beats Studio Pro is currently enjoying a 50% discount on Amazon right now, so check it out if you want to save big! The post Beats Studio Pro is enjoying a MASSIVE 50% discount RIGHT NOW! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Tyler Lee
excerpt: The Beats Studio Pro is currently enjoying a 50% discount on Amazon right now, so check it out if you want to save big!
text: If you’re looking for a pair of headphones that sounds good and looks stylish, then maybe the Beats Studio Pro could be the headphones for you. We know they don’t come cheap, but right now they are an absolute steal thanks to a 50% discount on Amazon. Buy On Amazon The headphones are normally priced at $380, but with this 50% discount, you can grab them for only $190! This is a limited time deal so you don’t want to wait too long. Also, this price includes 2 years of AppleCare+. This will provide you with extended warranty in case anything goes wrong. The Beats Studio Pro features USB-C connectivity in addition to being wireless. It offers one-touch pairing with Apple devices, but don’t worry, it will pair with Android devices too.There is also with active noise cancellation and transparency mode, and its battery life is rated for up to 40 hours on a single charge. html:
If you’re looking for a pair of headphones that sounds good and looks stylish, then maybe the Beats Studio Pro could be the headphones for you. We know they don’t come cheap, but right now they are an absolute steal thanks to a 50% discount on Amazon.

Buy On Amazon

The headphones are normally priced at $380, but with this 50% discount, you can grab them for only $190! This is a limited time deal so you don’t want to wait too long. Also, this price includes 2 years of AppleCare+. This will provide you with extended warranty in case anything goes wrong.

The Beats Studio Pro features USB-C connectivity in addition to being wireless. It offers one-touch pairing with Apple devices, but don’t worry, it will pair with Android devices too.There is also with active noise cancellation and transparency mode, and its battery life is rated for up to 40 hours on a single charge.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
